quotes.text: Focus is the gateway to thinking, perceiving, remembering, learning, reasoning, and problem-solving.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It's not about time, it's about choices. How are you spending your time?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: One way to boost our willpower and focus is to manage our distractions instead of letting them manage us.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Starve your distractions. Feed your focus.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.text: The shorter way to do many things is to do only one thing at a time.
quotes.author: Mozart

quotes.text: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.text: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.text: You can do anything, but not everything.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Efficiency is doing better what is already being done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.text: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The hard days are what make you stronger.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: The distance between your dreams and reality is called action.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
quotes.author: Camilla Eyring Kimball

quotes.text: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.text: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: An entrepreneur is someone who will jump off a cliff and assemble an airplane on the way down.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.text: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Mistakes are a fact of life. It is the response to the error that counts.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.text: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
quotes.author: Vernon Sanders Law

quotes.text: To know how much there is to know is the beginning of learning to live.
quotes.author: Dorothy West

quotes.text: Goal setting is the secret to a compelling future.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The Sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: I'm a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou
